name: Unseen Lust Demo version
description:
Unseen Lust is a story about a young college boy who recently lost his best friend due to a car accident on their way to a school party. He went on a 7 months comma which results in losing his memory. He moves on with his doctor whom she never knew she caused the accident

Release Date: 10-06-2020

Developer: FlipJoker
Censored: No

Version: Demo

OS: Windows

Language: English

This game is only available on windows. Android version coming on the next update
